title.value: IHE Code set for use with mACM Alert Category

description.value: IHE Code set for use with mACM Alert Category

copyright.value: Some content from IHE® Copyright © 2015 [http://www.ihe.net/Governance/#Intellectual_Property](IHE International, Inc). This content is from the IHE Technical Frameworks and Supplements, available for free download and use at http://www.ihe.net/Technical_Frameworks/

display.value: Signifies that this communication is intended to be disseminated by the Alert Aggregator.

Signifies that this communication is intended to be disseminated by the Alert Aggregator and disseminated according to the Disseminate and Report Alert Status Option. For example, when the Alert Reporter wants the message disseminated by the in-house PCD system rather than the general contact method.
